name: The Last Lissassin
description: A retro RPG that brings back the difficulty and grind of old style RPGs. You are a member of the royal family Lissassin. You find one day that the entire family has been wiped out and a great evil has taken the land. You meet the ancestors of your family and learn of a great secret. You, along with a band of travelers, must do everything you can to save your family and restore the Lissassin name.
